Ratings.comment: Take her class if available! She is very knowledgeable about the arts world, and will give great feedback. She made the class enjoyable, and is funny!

Tess on a 1 on 1 level is an amazing teacher, but she doesn't have the skills to teach a regular class. She literally didn't teach us any new skills or materials as a class since the first month of class. Every day we went to class was a "work day" she said. The only way she would teach us anything is if we asked her how to do something 1 on 1
